scripts.ci: dotnet r build && dotnet r test
scripts.packCommon: pushd SkinnyControllersCommon && dotnet pack --configuration Release --include-source  --include-symbols --no-build -o ../PACK && popd
scripts.packV2: pushd SkinnyControllerGeneratorV2 && dotnet pack --configuration Release --include-source  --include-symbols --no-build -o ../PACK && popd
